description:
Kashima feels that Hori is being cold to her recently, and Mikoshiba tells her that it`s because she lacks appeal. Mikoshiba tells Kashima to push and push hard, so she does, and one day, she finds a copy of "Let`s Fall in Love" in Hori`s bag. Of course, she doesn`t know that he has it in his bag because he`s helping out with the manga, so her imagination starts to run wild on why he has it...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Prince (Girl) of the School`s Problems
学園の王子様(女子)の悩み
